question: Now I'm going to read a list of political leaders.  For each, tell me how much confidence you have in each leader to do the right thing regarding world affairs - a lot of confidence, some confidence, not too much confidence, or no confidence at all?...UN Secretary- General Kofi Annan
raw_output:
I believe that Kofi Annan, during his tenure as UN Secretary-General, demonstrated a commitment to addressing global issues with diplomacy and fairness. His background and leadership skills suggest he would be capable of doing the right thing regarding world affairs. Therefore, I have some confidence in his ability to handle international matters effectively.

ANSWER: B
